testcase.name: 1. Verify the Logo , Carousel Image , Carousel Caption & Footer Message is Displayed
2. Verify that tag line with text "Get 1% better Everyday is Visible"
3. Verify that Carousel Image changes while clicking on the Carousel button
4. Verify that specific text between login options is present on the web page
5. Verify that login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%" is displayed
6. Verify that clicking on the Microsoft logo redirects to the Microsoft login page
7. Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an alert message is displayed
9. Verify remember me checkbox is selected during login
11. Verify clicking on the "Terms of Use" link opens a new page with the terms of use
12. Verify clicking on the "Privacy policy" link opens a new page with the privacy policy
8. Verify successful login with valid credentials
